Uses of Interface
tripleplay.platform.NativeTextField

  • Packages that use NativeTextField 
    Package Description
    tripleplay.platform  

    • Uses of NativeTextField in tripleplay.platform

      Methods in tripleplay.platform that return NativeTextField 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract NativeTextField TPPlatform.createNativeTextField()
      Creates a native text field, if this platform supports it.
      NativeTextField NativeTextField.refreshMode(NativeTextField.Mode mode)
      Updates or creates a new native text field with the given mode.
      NativeTextField NativeTextField.setAutocapitalization(boolean useAutocapitalization)
      Configures the autocapitalization behavior of the field on a virtual keyboard.
      NativeTextField NativeTextField.setAutocorrection(boolean useAutocorrection)
      Configures the autocorrection behavior of the field on a virtual keyboard.
      NativeTextField NativeTextField.setBounds(pythagoras.f.IRectangle bounds)
      Configures the bounds of the native text field (in top-level screen coordinates).
      NativeTextField NativeTextField.setEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Sets the enabled state of the field.
      NativeTextField NativeTextField.setFont(Font font)
      Configures the font used by the field to render text.
      NativeTextField NativeTextField.setReturnKeyLabel(String label)
      Configures the label of the return key on virtual keyboards.
      NativeTextField NativeTextField.setTextType(Keyboard.TextType type)
      Configures the type of text expected to be entered in this field.
      NativeTextField NativeTextField.setTransformer(NativeTextField.Transformer transformer)
      Sets the transformer for use with this native field.
      NativeTextField NativeTextField.setValidator(NativeTextField.Validator validator)
      Sets the validator for use with this native field.
